description:
Spanglish is a Spanish-English / English-Spanish dictionary and translator app for the HP webOS operating system. Based upon previous work "Habla!" by Khalid Draper, this open source software now includes the ability to JustType your Spanish or English word or short phrase using webos 2.0+ making it even easier to understand and speak Spanish. The program is also streamlined to be more intuitive and fun to use.
It introduces users to the other opportunities for learning and exchange available at SpanishDict.com and makes it easy to view the word of the day.
versionNote: Corrected bugs (spinner, checks for internet connection). Enter phrases up to 70 characters.
